title: Valeriy Yablochkin
text: Valeriy Nikolayevich Yablochkin (; born 2 February 1973 in <a href="Temirtau">Temirtau</a>) is a retired <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29%23Striker">forward</a> from <a href="Kazakhstan">Kazakhstan</a>. He obtained a total number of two caps for the <a href="Kazakhstan%20national%20football%20team">Kazakhstan national football team</a> during his career, scoring one goal.
